tool_description: Mojitok Sticker Store API/SDK is a curated store of licensed animated stickers, emojis, and GIFs.
name: Mojitok Sticker Store SDK
title: Mojitok Sticker Store SDK

api_list.name: /stickers/trending
api_list.description: API that provides information on creators and stickerpacks of 16 popular stickers

optional_parameters.name: include
optional_parameters.description: Use when you want to receive a response including sticker pack or creator information

data.description: Object containing the information of the sticker

items.description: (Inner) Object containing the creator's SNS information

priority.description: The order in which they should be displayed

type.description: Types of SNS services used by creators

url.description: Prefix of the url to the personal page for each SNS

content.description: String written in a specific language

language.description:
The language used when writing the string. Provides only "en" and "local"

- en: English
- local: Creator's local language

content.description: String written in a specific language

language.description:
The language used when writing the string. Provides only "en" and "local"

- en: English
- local: Creator's local language

content.description: String written in a specific language

language.description:
The language used when writing the string. Provides only "en" and "local"

- en: English
- local: Creator's local language

items.description: (Inner) Object containing price information by currency

priceType.description:
Type of commodity price
- FREE
  - Permanently free
- TIER_2
  - 1.99 USD(KRW 2500)

productType.description:
Name of product type
- STICKER_PACK
  - Sticker pack

items.description: (Inner) Object containing product discount or free usage information

discountPercentType.description:
Type of percentage to discount
- NONE
  No discount
- DISCOUNT_PERCENT_10
  10% discount
- DISCOUNT_PERCENT_20
  20% discount
- DISCOUNT_PERCENT_30
  30% discount
- DISCOUNT_PERCENT_40
  40% discount
- DISCOUNT_PERCENT_50
  50% discount

freeUse.description: Information on free use of products

availableDayCount.description: Days of free use, Present only when "freeUseType" is DAY_COUNT

freeUseDueDate.description:
Free expiration date, according to ISO 8601 format.
Present only when freeUseType is DUE_DATE

freeUseType.description:
Type of free use applied to the sticker pack
- DAY_COUNT
  Free use as much as "availableDayCount"
- DUE_DATE
  Free use up to "freeUseDueDate"

endDate.description: End date, according to ISO 8601 format

startDate.description: Start date, according to ISO 8601 format

- local: Creator's local language

stickerPackId.description: ID of the sticker pack to which the sticker belongs
